item.title: UFO sightings in the Canary Islands
item.description:
UFO Sightings in the Canary Islands ðŸ”—

This is a list of alleged sightings of unidentified flying objects (UFOs) in the Canary Islands. The article has been flagged for needing additional citations, requiring cleanup, and having multiple issues.

Sightings ðŸ”—

This section lists specific dates of reported UFO sightings in the Canary Islands:

  • 1974 â€“ 24 November: A sighting is recorded on this date.
  • 1976 â€“ 22 June: This sighting is notable due to its duration (over 40 minutes), multiple locations (Tenerife, La Palma, La Gomera, Gran Canaria, and a ship at sea), and numerous witnesses (hundreds of people, including civilians and military personnel). Two witnesses reported seeing occupants inside the craft, but this account is considered dubious by Antonio Munaiz, a military judge who wrote the Spanish government report, and Carlos Dolz de Espejo, the lieutenant general of the Air Force at the time. The official report by the Spanish Air Force was declassified in June 1994, with much of its content released earlier in 1977 by journalist and paranormal investigator J.J. Benitez, who used it for a book on UFO cases.
  • 1976 â€“ 19 November: Another sighting is noted on this date.
  • 1979 â€“ 5 March: A final sighting is listed for this date.

See also ðŸ”—

This section contains a link to the “List of reported UFO sightings” Wikipedia page.

References ðŸ”—

This section lists the sources cited in the article:

  1. A source labeled “Unknown” links to an archived page from the Spanish Ministry of Defence’s virtual library.
  2. A link to the “Biblioteca Virtual del Ministerio de Defensa” (Virtual Library of the Ministry of Defence) from 2012.
  3. Another source labeled “Unknown” links to a page from the Spanish Ministry of Defence’s virtual library.

External links ðŸ”—

This section provides a link to MUFON (Mutual UFO Network) for recent UFO sightings and pictures.

source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UFO_sightings_in_the_Canary_Islands
